alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Garvin; Grady; Stephens; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:55AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Comanche, western Garvin, southern Grady, northwestern Stephens, Cotton, southeastern Tillman, northwestern Clay, north central Archer, Wichita and east central Wilbarger Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Agawam to near Harrold. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph from the northwest. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Wichita Falls, Lawton, Duncan, Burkburnett, Marlow, Walters, Iowa Park, Electra, Geronimo, Rush Springs, Bray, Grandfield, Temple, Sterling, Chattanooga, Randlett, Devol, Faxon, Loveland, and Corum. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This wind shift will affect fire fighting efforts. Please advise fire crews in the field of the change in wind direction. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Comanche; Cotton; Garvin; Grady; Stephens; Tillman
